titles: An excellent sonnet: or, The swaines complaint whose cruell doome, it was to love hee knew not whom. To the tune of, Bodkins Galiard.
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
publisher: for I. Wright dwelling in Gilt-spurre street neere New-gate,
notes: Verse - "You gentle nimphs that on the meddowes play,".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
